title: Classic A-Line Midi Dress with Contrast Piping
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a classic A-line midi dress, sleeveless, scoop neckline, soft drape, solid pastel blush pink with white contrast piping along neckline and armholes, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims, isolated on plain white background
techpack: A-line midi dress in cotton poplin with polyester lining; sleeveless scoop neckline; white contrast piping at neckline and armholes; invisible back zipper closure; hem finished with topstitching; length from shoulder to hem approx. 110cm.
provenance: Inspired by commercial A-line silhouettes from contemporary womenswear trends.
